headline: Globe Life Shares Sink on Short Seller ‘Empty Office’ Claims
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Globe Life Inc. shares fell after a short seller said its American Income Life unit appears to have shuttered several major offices.Most Read from BloombergAs Wars Rage, Cities Face a Dark New Era of Urban DestructionRiyadh Metro Partially Opens in Bid to Ease City’s Traffic JamsShares of Globe Life slid 2.4% to $106.82 at 2:52 p.m. in New York, after tumbling as much as 8.4% earlier Wednesday, after Viceroy Research published a report saying “something is seriously wrong” at AIL
